At 07:56 AM 5/29/2005, you wrote:
>Sorry to ressurect the whole Hayes thing, but god is there no decency.

   Yeah. God forbid the man would want to make any money teaching classes 
and such. He's got a lot fo nerve wanting to feed his family, build a 
retirement account, buy a nice car, etc. He should live in the darned woods 
and eat grubs and tree bark. If he were a self-respecting ninja master 
that's exactly what he would do! What a loser. Sheesh. LOL


   Mark Arsenault
